p: In conclusion, previous findings warrant concurrent real-time surveillance of all sexually-transmitted diseases at local and national scales and point out the dramatically poor knowledge of HIV infected MSM about transmission of HAV and other STD in the new area of ‘condomless sex’. Further studies might determine the efficiency of specific social networks in preventing the spread of STD. Finally, previous data question if the expand in France of TasP and PrEP to control HIV transmission may impact on the transmission of others sexual transmitted diseases, including HA.
